meanings.definition: Chemical substances emitted by an organism to attract or repel other organisms.
meanings.sent1: The kairomones released by the flower attracted bees for pollination.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how kairomones help plants communicate with insects.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky squirrel used kairomones to trick the birds into leaving the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The kairomones of danger warned the fish to swim away from the predator.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with the sweet scent of kairomones, inviting all creatures to explore.
